statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

article.description: Shivaughn Wiggins and Jaylen Shaw combined to score 45 points and Coastal Carolina built a big first-half lead and coasted to a 78-63 win over Charleston Southern Saturday.
article.headline: Coastal Carolina coasts past Charleston Southern, 78-63
article.linkText: Coastal Carolina coasts past Charleston Southern, 78-63
article.story: CHARLESTON, S.C. -- Shivaughn Wiggins and Jaylen Shaw combined to score 45 points and Coastal Carolina built a big first-half lead and coasted to a 78-63 win over Charleston Southern Saturday. The Chanticleers raced to a 44-23 lead by intermission, with Shaw knocking down three 3-pointers in the final 7:01 to cap the period. Elijah Wilson hit a pair of 3-pointers in the opening minutes of the second half but Charleston Southern had a 10-0 run that cut the lead to 54-42 with 13:15 remaining in the game. Wiggins was 6 of 9 from the field and 9 of 11 from the line to finish with 23 points for the Chanticleers (11-8, 5-4 Big South). Shaw with 8 of 16 from the field, including 3 of 7 from beyond the arc, for 22 points. Javis Howard scored 15 points to lead the Buccaneers (8-12k, 4-5), and Armel Potter added 14.
